column3: 今主が見たは 100年前の この場所……
column4:
What you just saw happened where you stand
100 years ago...

column3:
その剣が主の手を離れ ハイラルの姫巫女によって
この地に運ばれた時の出来事よ……
column4:
After you were separated from the sword,
the princess thought to bring it here,where she knew that it would be safe
under my watch.

column3:
あの娘は今もハイラル城で懸命に戦っておる

主が必ず来てくれる と信じてな……
column4:
She continues to fight, trapped deep within the
confines of Hyrule Castle.Her heart cascades with faith that you will return.

column3:
あの娘の笑顔……

儂も今一度見てみたいものよ……
column4:
She has a smile like the sun...I would do much to feel its warmth
upon me once again.
